definition: to change into/to turn into/to become
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Vishnu changed for the dwarf and Beelzebub fighting to save the world's religious story of relief.
sentences.chinese: 毗溼奴變作侏儒與魔王戰鬥拯救世界的宗教故事浮雕。

sentences.english: The Life Eternal but a baseless dream?
sentences.chinese: 永生會變作無稽的夢想。

sentences.english: And I closed and opened my hand again, and behold there was a bird.
sentences.chinese: 我合掌又張開，瞧，它又變作一隻鳥。

sentences.english: I wish to be the Yangtze River.
Change your laughter to mourning and your joy to gloom.
sentences.chinese: 將喜笑變作悲哀，歡樂變作愁悶。

sentences.english: Change your laughter to mourning and your joy to gloom.
sentences.chinese: 將喜笑變作悲哀，歡樂變作愁悶。

sentences.english: Who made the old bailey a judge of beauty?
sentences.chinese: 是誰讓老貝勒變作了選美評判員的？

sentences.english: Don't spend time beating on a wall hoping to transform it into a door.
sentences.chinese: 不要浪費時間敲一堵牆，你無法將其變作一扇門。

sentences.english: Erh-lang turned into a huge sea crane and pursued the crow.
sentences.chinese: 二郎神急抖翎毛，搖身變作大海鶴，鑽上雲霄來啄。

sentences.english: Here was the best the books had to offer coming true.
sentences.chinese: 書本知識的精華在這地變作了現實。

sentences.english: But DuPont’s new cellulosic process can turn the entire corn plant into fuel.
sentences.chinese: 杜邦公司開發的纖維素新工藝可把整株玉米變作燃料。

sentences.english: Wu-k'ung dived into a brook and changed into a fish.
sentences.chinese: 那大聖又將身按下，鑽進溪流裏變作一條魚兒。

sentences.english: Behold, Damascus is taken away from being a city, and it shall be a ruinous heap.
sentences.chinese: 看哪，大馬士革已被廢棄，不再爲城，必變作亂堆。

sentences.english: Jean turned to the viewport and thought of the phoenix once more, the transubstantiation of an entire race.
sentences.chinese: 吉音轉向窗口，又想起了整個因維人族羣變作的鳳凰。

sentences.english: And the she-devil hiding inside kicked him way up into the air.
sentences.chinese: 變作山羊的惡女魔一腳把他遠遠地踢到天上。

sentences.english: And he cast it on the ground， and it became a serpent； and Moses fled from before it.
sentences.chinese: 他一丟下去，就變作蛇，摩西便跑開。
